tidbits.title: Cultural Traditions
tidbits.description: Samoa maintains strong cultural traditions known as fa'a Samoa, encompassing dance, tattooing, and communal activities, preserving a rich heritage.

tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: The islands boast stunning natural attractions, including To Sua Ocean Trench, a picturesque swimming hole, and the impressive Alofaaga Blowholes.

tidbits.title: Early Polynesian Wayfinders
tidbits.description: Samoa is believed to be a central hub for Polynesian exploration, with early settlers using celestial navigation to traverse the Pacific Ocean.
